title: Accounting and Business
shortDescription: Combine accounting principles with business strategy.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 Accounting and Business course develops financial understanding and management skills for university progression.

title: Business Management
shortDescription: Develop management skills for modern organisations.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 Business Management course builds practical leadership, operations, and decision-making skills for progression to university study.

title: Cyber Security
shortDescription: Understand threats, controls, and secure practices.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 Cyber Security course introduces core security concepts, risk management, and practical controls aligned to industry expectations.

title: Entrepreneurship and Management
shortDescription: Build entrepreneurial thinking and business leadership skills.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course supports learners to develop enterprise skills, business planning, and management capabilities for progression.

title: Health & Social Care Management
shortDescription: Learn leadership and service delivery in care settings.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course develops management knowledge for health and social care organisations, supporting progression into higher education.
imageAlt: Health and Social Care Management course

title: Human Resource Management
shortDescription: Explore recruitment, performance, and people strategy.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 HRM course builds practical understanding of people management, employment practice, and organisational development.

title: IT and Computing
shortDescription: Develop core computing knowledge and practical IT skills.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 IT and Computing course supports progression by building foundations across systems, software concepts, and digital skills.

title: IT and E-commerce
shortDescription: Learn digital commerce operations and supporting technologies.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course introduces e-commerce models, digital platforms, and practical approaches to online business and operations.

title: IT and Networking
shortDescription: Understand networks, connectivity, and core infrastructure.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 IT and Networking course builds knowledge of network concepts, configuration fundamentals, and supporting infrastructure.

title: IT and Web Design
shortDescription: Build web design knowledge with practical digital skills.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course introduces web design principles, user experience basics, and practical approaches to building web content.

title: Law
shortDescription: Build legal knowledge and analytical reasoning skills.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 Law course provides a solid foundation in legal principles and prepares learners for LLB progression.

title: Leadership and Teamwork
shortDescription: Strengthen leadership behaviours and team performance.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course focuses on practical leadership, communication, and teamwork skills for professional and academic progression.

title: Logistics and Supply Chain Management
shortDescription: Understand supply chains, operations, and logistics planning.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course covers supply chain fundamentals, logistics operations, and planning approaches used in real organisations.
imageAlt: Logistics and Supply Chain Management course

title: Sales and Marketing
shortDescription: Learn how to position products and sell effectively.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course covers marketing fundamentals, buyer behaviour, and sales approaches relevant to modern organisations.

title: Psychology
shortDescription: Explore behaviour, cognition, and psychological theories.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 Psychology course introduces key psychology areas and supports progression into further university-level study.

title: Tourism and Hospitality Management
shortDescription: Develop service and management skills for hospitality sectors.
overview: This Level 4 & 5 course introduces tourism and hospitality operations, service quality, and management fundamentals for progression.
